publications.name: In-Silo Federated Learning vs. Centralized Learning for Segmenting Acute and Chronic Ischemic Brain Lesions
publications.summary: Comparative analysis of Federated and Centralized Learning on brain MRI images. Showed Federated Learning is as effective as Centralized learning on real-life non-i.i.d. brain lesion datasets of ~10,000 patients over 9 institutions.

publications.name: Random Gradient Masking as a Defensive Measure to Deep Leakage in Federated Learning
publications.summary: Compared the efficacy of randomly masking gradients from Federated Learning submissions against other defenses against Deep Leakage from Gradients such as Pruning, Compression, and Noising on Convolution Neural Networks

work.name: Rising Lab (University of Florida)
work.summary: Explored network-level bit flipping attacks on 5G Connected and Automated Vehicles (CAV). Identified vulnerabilities and proposed defense based on Forward Error Correction.

work.name: JLK Inc.
